title: Custom Network
oracles-staked-description: The amount of tokens locked by users to curate the network

hero.title: Networks
hero.explanatory-text: A list of all the networks using BEPRO network for their development

lock.title: Lock {{currency}}
lock.you-need-to-lock: To create a network you will need to lock {{creatorAmount}} {{currency}}

network-information.title: Network information
network-information.you-can-change: You can change this information later in your Network Settings page.

name.label: Display name
name.helper: This will be you network name, it also affects your query URL.
name.unavailable: This network name is not available. Please pick a different name.

colors.label: Colours
colors.similar-colors: These colours are very similar. Please pick a different colour.

network-information.logo-helper: The logos must be in .svg format

repositories.title: Add Repositories
repositories.give-access: Give access to the {{user}} as an org maintainer.
repositories.you-need-to-accept: You need to accept this so the bot can interact with the repositories.
repositories.label: Repositories
repositories.used-by-other-network: The highlighted repositories are already being used by another network.
repositories.has-bounties: The highlighted repositories already have bounties and can't be removed.

tokens-dropdown.label: Network Token
tokens-dropdown.description: Add an ERC20 token to be used as network token.

update-github-token.title: Update your Github Token
update-github-token.description: To create your custom network we need permission to access your repositories

deploy-nft-token.title: New NFT
deploy-nft-token.description: Deploy a New NFT Token for your network

messages.refresh-the-page: Refresh the page for the changes to take effect.

errors.not-found: You don't have a custom network created.
errors.dispute-time: The time that proposals can be disputed. Min. {{min}} and Max. {{max}} seconds.
errors.percentage-for-dispute: `Percentage needed for a proposal to be disputed by the community. Max. {{max}}%.`
errors.redeem-time: The time after a bounty creation that it can be cancelled. Min. {{min}} and Max. {{max}} seconds.
errors.council-amount: The amount of {{token}} locked needed to be a council member. Min. {{min}} and Max. {{max}}.
